name: .RBP File Extension
summary: Learn about .RBP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by Xojo, a software development IDE that uses the Realbasic programming language; can be built into a single executable that runs without depending on external .DLL files or virtual machines.

content: Real Studio projects can often be created from Visual Basic projects (.VBP files) using the VB Project Converter included with Real Studio.
Programs created by Real Studio can be run on Mac, Windows, and Linux operating systems.
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
